Add/remove an advancement and all its ch.description: Grant/revoke an advancement and all child advancements

Add/removes an advancement, all its pare.description: Grant/revoke an advancement, its parent, and its children.

Add/remove an advancement and all its pa.description: Grant/revoke an advancement and all parent advancements

Get total attribute value.description: Get the computed value of an entity's attribute

body: attribute ${1:<target: Entity>} ${2:<attribute: Attribute>} base get ${3:[<scale: Number>]}
Get attribute base value.description: Get the base value of an entity's attribute

body: attribute ${1:<target: Entity>} ${2:<attribute: Attribute>} base set ${3:[<scale: Number>]}
Set attribute base value.description: Set the base value of an entity's attribute

Add attribute modifier.description: Adds an attribute modifier with the specified properties if no modifier with the same UUID already existed.

Remove attribute modifier.description: Removes the attribute modifier with the specified UUID.

body: attribute ${1:<target: Entity>} ${2:<attribute: Attribute>} modifier value get ${3:<uuid>} ${4:[<scale: Number>]}
Get attribute modifier.description: Returns the value of the modifier with the specified UUID.
